fields.name: token
fields.description: Bearer token for authentication

records.name: BearerTokenConfig
records.description: Represents token for Bearer token authentication.

records.name: ClientConfiguration
records.description:
Configurations for the WebSocket client.
The following fields are inherited from the other configuration records in addition to the client-specific configs.                    |

records.name: ClientSecureSocket
records.description: Configures the SSL/TLS options to be used for WebSocket client.

fields.name: subProtocols
fields.description: Negotiable sub protocols of the client

fields.name: customHeaders
fields.description: Custom headers, which should be sent to the server

fields.name: readTimeout
fields.description: Read timeout (in seconds) of the client

fields.name: secureSocket
fields.description: SSL/TLS-related options

fields.name: maxFrameSize
fields.description:
The maximum payload size of a WebSocket frame in bytes.
If this is not set, is negative, or is zero, the default frame size of 65536 will be used

fields.name: webSocketCompressionEnabled
fields.description: Enable support for compression in the WebSocket

fields.name: handShakeTimeout
fields.description:
Time (in seconds) that a connection waits to get the response of
the WebSocket handshake. If the timeout exceeds, then the connection is terminated with
an error. If the value < 0, then the value sets to the default value(300)

fields.name: cookies
fields.description: An Array of `http:Cookie`

fields.name: auth
fields.description: Configurations related to client authentication

fields.name: pingPongHandler
fields.description:
A service to handle the ping/pong frames.
Resources in this service gets called on the receipt of ping/pong frames from the server

records.name: CommonClientConfiguration
records.description: Common client configurations for WebSocket clients.

records.name: CredentialsConfig
records.description: Represents credentials for Basic Auth authentication.

records.name: FileUserStoreConfig
records.description: Represents file user store configurations for Basic Auth authentication.

fields.name: fileUserStoreConfig
fields.description: File user store configurations for Basic Auth authentication

fields.name: scopes
fields.description: Scopes allowed for authorization

records.name: FileUserStoreConfigWithScopes
records.description: Represents the auth annotation for file user store configurations with scopes.

records.name: JwtIssuerConfig
records.description: Represents JWT issuer configurations for JWT authentication.

fields.name: scopeKey
fields.description: The key used to fetch the scopes

records.name: JwtValidatorConfig
records.description: Represents JWT validator configurations for JWT authentication.

fields.name: jwtValidatorConfig
fields.description: JWT validator configurations for JWT authentication

fields.name: scopes
fields.description: Scopes allowed for authorization

records.name: JwtValidatorConfigWithScopes
records.description: Represents the auth annotation for JWT validator configurations with scopes.

records.name: LdapUserStoreConfig
records.description: Represents LDAP user store configurations for Basic Auth authentication.

fields.name: ldapUserStoreConfig
fields.description: LDAP user store configurations for Basic Auth authentication

fields.name: scopes
fields.description: Scopes allowed for authorization

records.name: LdapUserStoreConfigWithScopes
records.description: Represents the auth annotation for LDAP user store configurations with scopes.

fields.name: host
fields.description: The host name/IP of the endpoint

fields.name: http1Settings
fields.description: Configurations related to HTTP/1.x protocol

fields.name: secureSocket
fields.description:
The SSL configurations for the service endpoint. This needs to be configured in order to
communicate through WSS.

fields.name: timeout
fields.description:
Period of time in seconds that a connection waits for a read/write operation in the
initial upgrade request. Use value 0 to disable timeout

fields.name: server
fields.description: The server name which should appear as a response header

fields.name: webSocketCompressionEnabled
fields.description: Enable support for compression in WebSocket

fields.name: requestLimits
fields.description: Configurations associated with inbound request size limits

records.name: ListenerConfiguration
records.description: Provides a set of configurations for HTTP service endpoints.

records.name: ListenerHttp1Settings
records.description: Provides settings related to HTTP/1.x protocol.

records.name: ListenerSecureSocket
records.description: Configures the SSL/TLS options to be used for WebSocket service.

records.name: OAuth2ClientCredentialsGrantConfig
records.description: Represents OAuth2 client credentials grant configurations for OAuth2 authentication.

fields.name: scopeKey
fields.description: The key used to fetch the scopes

records.name: OAuth2IntrospectionConfig
records.description: Represents OAuth2 introspection server configurations for OAuth2 authentication.

fields.name: oauth2IntrospectionConfig
fields.description: OAuth2 introspection server configurations for OAuth2 authentication

fields.name: scopes
fields.description: Scopes allowed for authorization

records.name: OAuth2IntrospectionConfigWithScopes
records.description: Represents the auth annotation for OAuth2 introspection server configurations with scopes.

elementType.name: record {| string refreshUrl; string[] scopes?; map<string> optionalParams?; ballerina/oauth2:1.1.0-beta.2:CredentialBearer credentialBearer; ballerina/oauth2:1.1.0-beta.2:ClientConfiguration clientConfig; |}

records.name: OAuth2PasswordGrantConfig
records.description: Represents OAuth2 password grant configurations for OAuth2 authentication.

records.name: OAuth2RefreshTokenGrantConfig
records.description: Represents OAuth2 refresh token grant configurations for OAuth2 authentication.

records.name: RequestLimitConfigs
records.description: Provides inbound request URI, total header and entity body size threshold configurations.

fields.name: subProtocols
fields.description: Negotiable sub protocol by the service

fields.name: idleTimeout
fields.description:
Idle timeout for the client connection. Upon timeout, `onIdleTimeout` resource (if defined)
in the server service will be triggered. Note that this overrides the `timeout` config
in the `websocket:Listener` which is applicable only for the initial HTTP upgrade request.

fields.name: maxFrameSize
fields.description:
The maximum payload size of a WebSocket frame in bytes.
If this is not set or is negative or zero, the default frame size which is 65536 will be used.

fields.name: auth
fields.description: Listener authenticaton configurations

records.name: WSServiceConfig
records.description: Configurations for a WebSocket service.

objectTypes.name: PingPongService
objectTypes.description: The WebSocket service type to handle ping/pong frames

returnParameters.description: A `websocket:Error` if an error occurs when sending

remoteMethods.name: writeTextMessage
remoteMethods.description:
Pushes text messages to the connection. If an error occurs while sending the text message to the connection, that message
will be lost.

returnParameters.description: A `websocket:Error` if an error occurs when sending

remoteMethods.name: writeBinaryMessage
remoteMethods.description:
Pushes binary data to the connection. If an error occurs while sending the binary message to the connection,
that message will be lost.

returnParameters.description: A `websocket:Error` if an error occurs when sending

remoteMethods.name: ping
remoteMethods.description: Pings the connection. If an error occurs while sending the ping frame to the server, that frame will be lost.

returnParameters.description: A `websocket:Error` if an error occurs when sending

remoteMethods.name: pong
remoteMethods.description:
Sends a pong message to the connection. If an error occurs while sending the pong frame to the connection, that
the frame will be lost.

parameters.name: statusCode
parameters.description: Status code for closing the connection

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description:
Time to wait (in seconds) for the close frame to be received from the remote endpoint before closing the
connection. If the timeout exceeds, then the connection is terminated even though a close frame
is not received from the remote endpoint. If the value < 0 (e.g., -1), then the connection waits
until a close frame is received. If the WebSocket frame is received from the remote endpoint
within the waiting period, the connection is terminated immediately.

returnParameters.description: A `websocket:Error` if an error occurs when sending
A `websocket:Error` if an error occurs when sending

methods.name: writeTextMessage
methods.description:
Pushes text messages to the connection. If an error occurs while sending the text message to the connection, that message
will be lost.

returnParameters.description: A `websocket:Error` if an error occurs when sending

methods.name: writeBinaryMessage
methods.description:
Pushes binary data to the connection. If an error occurs while sending the binary message to the connection,
that message will be lost.

returnParameters.description: A `websocket:Error` if an error occurs when sending

methods.name: ping
methods.description: Pings the connection. If an error occurs while sending the ping frame to the server, that frame will be lost.

returnParameters.description: A `websocket:Error` if an error occurs when sending

methods.name: pong
methods.description:
Sends a pong message to the connection. If an error occurs while sending the pong frame to the connection, that
the frame will be lost.

parameters.name: statusCode
parameters.description: Status code for closing the connection

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description:
Time to wait (in seconds) for the close frame to be received from the remote endpoint before closing the
connection. If the timeout exceeds, then the connection is terminated even though a close frame
is not received from the remote endpoint. If the value < 0 (e.g., -1), then the connection waits
until a close frame is received. If the WebSocket frame is received from the remote endpoint
within the waiting period, the connection is terminated immediately.

returnParameters.description: A `websocket:Error` if an error occurs when sending

parameters.name: statusCode
parameters.description: Status code for closing the connection

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description:
Time to wait (in seconds) for the close frame to be received from the remote endpoint before closing the
connection. If the timeout exceeds, then the connection is terminated even though a close frame
is not received from the remote endpoint. If the value is < 0 (e.g., -1), then the connection
waits until a close frame is received. If the WebSocket frame is received from the remote
endpoint within the waiting period, the connection is terminated immediately.

returnParameters.description: A `websocket:Error` if an error occurs while closing the WebSocket connection
The text data sent by the server or a `websocket:Error` if an error occurs when receiving

the frame will be lost.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description:
Time to wait (in seconds) for the close frame to be received from the remote endpoint before closing the
connection. If the timeout exceeds, then the connection is terminated even though a close frame
is not received from the remote endpoint. If the value is < 0 (e.g., -1), then the connection
waits until a close frame is received. If the WebSocket frame is received from the remote
endpoint within the waiting period, the connection is terminated immediately.

returnParameters.description: A `websocket:Error` if an error occurs while closing the WebSocket connection

clients.name: Client
clients.description: Represents a WebSocket synchronous client endpoint.

parameters.name: websocketService
parameters.description: The service that needs to be attached

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the service attachment process or else `()`

lifeCycleMethods.name: attach
lifeCycleMethods.description: Attaches a service to the listener.

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the listener starting process

methods.name: 'start
methods.description: Starts the registered service programmatically.

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the listener stopping process

methods.name: gracefulStop
methods.description: Stops the service listener gracefully. Already-accepted requests will be served before connection closure.

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the listener stop process

methods.name: immediateStop
methods.description: Stops the service listener immediately. It is not implemented yet.

parameters.name: websocketService
parameters.description: The service that needs to be attached

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the service attachment process or else `()`

methods.name: attach
methods.description: Attaches a service to the listener.

returnParameters.description: An `error` if one occurred during detaching of a service or else `()`

methods.name: detach
methods.description:
Detaches a WebSocket service from the listener. Note that detaching a WebSocket service would not affect
The functionality of the existing connections.

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Configurations for the WebSocket service listener

methods.name: init
methods.description: Gets invoked during the module initialization to initialize the listener.

An `error` if an error occurred during the listener stopping process

otherMethods.description: Stops the service listener gracefully. Already-accepted requests will be served before connection closure.

otherMethods.name: immediateStop
otherMethods.description: Stops the service listener immediately. It is not implemented yet.

otherMethods.name: detach
otherMethods.description:
Detaches a WebSocket service from the listener. Note that detaching a WebSocket service would not affect
The functionality of the existing connections.

listeners.name: Listener
listeners.description:
This is used for creating WebSocket server endpoints. A WebSocket server endpoint is capable of responding to
remote callers. The `Listener` is responsible for initializing the endpoint using the provided configurations.

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Represents the cookies to be added

functions.name: addCookies
functions.description: Adds cookies to the custom header.

parameters.name: serviceRef
parameters.description: The service reference where the resource locates

functions.name: authenticateResource
functions.description:
Uses for declarative auth design, where the authentication/authorization decision is taken
by reading the auth annotations provided in service/resource and the `Authorization` header of request.

constants.name: AUTH_SCHEME_BASIC
constants.description: The prefix used to denote the Basic authentication scheme.

constants.name: AUTH_SCHEME_BEARER
constants.description: The prefix used to denote the Bearer authentication scheme.

annotations.name: ServiceConfig
annotations.description: The annotation which is used to configure a WebSocket service.

errors.name: AuthError
errors.description: Defines the Auth error types that returned from the client.

errors.name: AuthnError
errors.description: Defines the authentication error type that returned from the listener.

errors.name: AuthzError
errors.description: Defines the authorization error type that returned from the listener.

errors.name: ConnectionClosureError
errors.description: Raised during failures in connection closure.

errors.name: ConnectionError
errors.description: Raised during connection failures.

errors.name: Error
errors.description: Represents any error related to the WebSocket module.

errors.name: HandshakeTimedOut
errors.description: Raised when the initial WebSocket handshake timed out.

errors.name: InvalidContinuationFrameError
errors.description: Raised when an out of order/invalid continuation frame is received.

errors.name: InvalidHandshakeError
errors.description: Raised during the handshake when the WebSocket upgrade fails.

errors.name: PayloadTooLargeError
errors.description: Raised when receiving a frame with a payload exceeding the maximum size.

errors.name: ProtocolError
errors.description: Raised when the other side breaks the protocol.

errors.name: ReadTimedOutError
errors.description: Raised when the client read time out reaches.

errors.name: SslError
errors.description: Raised when the SSL handshake fails.

errors.name: UpgradeError
errors.description: Raised when the WebSocket upgrade is not accepted.

types.name: ClientAuthConfig

types.name: ListenerAuthConfig
types.description: Defines the authentication configurations for the WebSocket listener.

types.name: OAuth2GrantConfig
types.description: Represents OAuth2 grant configurations for OAuth2 authentication.
